content.rendered: Expertise and integrity have earned Martinis & Farley a reputation as one of the premier law firms serving the Willamette Valley. They represent individuals and business in a variety of areas, including real estate and land use issues, personal injury cases, construct defect claims, estate planning, business law, and employment matters.
